FeatureExtractorLibrary

Class FeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • FeatureExtractorLibrary.FeatureExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFeatureExtractor

    public class FeatureExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFeatureExtractor
    This is a class with static methods meant to extract features from a dataset given as an ArrayList of Accelerometer objects or a CSV file, using the settings from Setting class.
    Since:
    23 ‎July, ‎2018

    • Method Summary

      Extracts features from the given file.
      static void extractFeaturesFromCsvFileToFile(java.lang.String inputFileName, java.lang.String outputFileName)
      Extracts features from the given file to an output file that's type is specified in the Settings.

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeaturesFromArrayListToArrayListOfFeatures

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Feature> extractFeaturesFromArrayListToArrayListOfFeatures(java.util.ArrayList<Accelerometer> dataset,
                                                                                             java.lang.String userId)
                                                                                      throws FeatureExtractorException
        Extracts features from the dataset.
        Parameters:
        dataset - ArrayList containing the data as Accelerometer object
        userId - subject Id
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing the resulting Feature objects
        Throws:
        FeatureExtractorException - if userId is empty
        FeatureExtractorException - if Settings are not properly given
        FeatureExtractorException - if dataset is empty
        Since:
        23 ‎July, ‎2018

      • extractFeaturesFromArrayListToFile

        public static void extractFeaturesFromArrayListToFile(java.util.ArrayList<Accelerometer> dataset,
                                                      java.lang.String userId,
                                                      java.lang.String filename)
                                               throws FeatureExtractorException
        Extracts features from the dataset into a file that's type is specified in the Settings.
        Parameters:
        dataset - ArrayList containing the data as Accelerometer object
        userId - subject Id
        filename - output file name that will contain the features
        Throws:
        FeatureExtractorException - if userId is empty
        FeatureExtractorException - if Settings are not properly given
        FeatureExtractorException - if dataset is empty
        FeatureExtractorException - if filename is empty
        Since:
        23 ‎July, ‎2018

      • extractFeaturesFromCsvFileToArrayListOfFeatures

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Feature> extractFeaturesFromCsvFileToArrayListOfFeatures(java.lang.String inputFileName)
                                                                                    throws FeatureExtractorException
        Extracts features from the given file.
        Parameters:
        inputFileName - file name that contains the userID in rawdata_userId_date_time format and the input data
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing the resulting Feature objects
        Throws:
        FeatureExtractorException - if Settings are not properly given
        FeatureExtractorException - if filename is empty
        Since:
        23 ‎July, ‎2018

      • extractFeaturesFromCsvFileToFile

        public static void extractFeaturesFromCsvFileToFile(java.lang.String inputFileName,
                                                    java.lang.String outputFileName)
                                             throws FeatureExtractorException
        Extracts features from the given file to an output file that's type is specified in the Settings.
        Parameters:
        inputFileName - file name containing the input data
        outputFileName - output file name that will contain the features
        Throws:
        FeatureExtractorException - if Settings are not properly given
        FeatureExtractorException - if filename is empty
        Since:
        23 ‎July, ‎2018
